about_the_game: This is a unique vertical version of the flight shooting mini-game, you will control your own aircraft in the vast and endless universe to explore the treasure, which will be an endless and interesting collection journey. Different from the conventional STG, the chip equipment system and cruise system are added in this work, and you can modify the attack mode of the fighter through the combination of special attributes, experience the combination of various fighters and chip equipment, and create your own fighter. And the cruise system will free up your time, so that the fighter can automatically cruise flight, anytime, anywhere online to view the level earnings. The Mystery Shop and Warplane Shop will provide you with more travel support, you can also use BOSS drops and mission reward red diamonds for raffles, we have prepared more than 100 warplanes and a variety of treasure items to help you continue your journey further into space.
detailed_description: This is a unique vertical version of the flight shooting mini-game, you will control your own aircraft in the vast and endless universe to explore the treasure, which will be an endless and interesting collection journey. Different from the conventional STG, the chip equipment system and cruise system are added in this work, and you can modify the attack mode of the fighter through the combination of special attributes, experience the combination of various fighters and chip equipment, and create your own fighter. And the cruise system will free up your time, so that the fighter can automatically cruise flight, anytime, anywhere online to view the level earnings. The Mystery Shop and Warplane Shop will provide you with more travel support, you can also use BOSS drops and mission reward red diamonds for raffles, we have prepared more than 100 warplanes and a variety of treasure items to help you continue your journey further into space.
name: 星际远航：寻宝

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: inter5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6200TC
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AUDIGY5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: inter6
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD2000
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AUDIGY5

short_description: This is an independent game that has been developed by two people in our studio for many years. Thank you to everyone who has supported our product.At present, the game is still a beta version, if you encounter bugs and other problems, please contact us, you will get a red diamond reward.
